tool.name: Replicate Filtering
tool.description: Step4 of SimStitch. Filters and merges replicates.
tool.command: matlab -logfile '${output_log}' -nosplash -r "cd('../../../../tools/SimStitch'); try; ReplicateFilter('${fileList}', '${html_input}', '${html_input.extra_files_path}', $ppm, $minpeak, $force, '${output_html}', '${output_html.files_path}', '${output_summary}'); catch; end; exit;"

param.name: fileList
param.label: List of files (.xml) produced by File List manager

param.name: html_input
param.label: List of output .mat files (.html) produced by Mass Calibration and SIM-stitching

param.name: ppm
param.label: ppm
param.help: Peaks accros samples are grouped and alligned if within this ppm range

param.name: minpeak
param.label: Minimum number of replicates a peak must be present

param.name: force
param.label: Use nearest peak if missing in replicate

data.name: output_html
data.label: Replicate Filtering on $html_input.hid: list of output files (.html)

tool.help: NB: if the output files are blank (Galaxy may say 'no peek' in the preview in the history) then you may have supplied the .txt output from Mass Calibration and SIM Stitch tool rather than the .mat files.
